de.unlixx.runpng.png

Class PngProjectManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.png.PngProjectManager

  • public class PngProjectManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The PngProjectManager controls reading and writing from or to an animated png project.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected PngProject m_project

      • ensureProject

        void ensureProject(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Ensures the existence of a PngProject.
        Parameters:
        document - A Document object. Or null if not yet known.

      • getProject

        public PngProject getProject()
        Gets the PngProject actually in use.
        Returns:
        A PngProject object. Or null if not yet created.

      • getMetaDataXML

        public java.lang.String getMetaDataXML()
        Gets the project meta data, formatted as an xml string.
        Returns:
        An xml formatted string containing the project meta data. Or null if there is no project object created yet.

      • getFileDescriptions

        public java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> getFileDescriptions()
        Gets a list of all file descriptions actually stored in the meta data document of the PngProject.
        Returns:
        A List object. Or null if there is no project object created yet.

      • setMetaData

        public void setMetaData(java.lang.String strXML)
        Parses the given xml meta data into a Document object and passes it to the PngProject. Creates a PngProject if it not exists yet.
        Parameters:
        strXML - A string containing the xml meta data.

      • addNamedSequence

        public void addNamedSequence(java.lang.String strName,
                             Bitmap32Sequence sequence)
        Adds a named bitmap sequence to the current project. Creates one if it not already exists.
        Parameters:
        strName - The name of the sequence.
        sequence - a Bitmap32Sequence object.

      • getNamedSequence

        public Bitmap32Sequence getNamedSequence(java.lang.String strName)
        Gets a bitmap sequence from the the current project.
        Parameters:
        strName - The name of the sequence.
        Returns:
        A Bitmap32Sequence object. Return null if it not exists or there is no project yet.
